analysis.description: ZeroBTCWorldCup.concludeTournament (/unique_chucks/39/0x10bb4a34bd28e38c42a9f02fd6e9804193dceee9.sol#663-704) allows anyone to destruct the contract
ZeroBTCWorldCup.pullRipCord (/unique_chucks/39/0x10bb4a34bd28e38c42a9f02fd6e9804193dceee9.sol#718-725) allows anyone to destruct the contract
